description:
Move a geo feature to a specified location.

monitoring.monitorlib.transformations.AbsoluteTranslation, as defined in monitoring/monitorlib/transformations.py

$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

new_latitude.description: The new latitude at which the feature should be located (degrees).

new_longitude.description: The new longitude at which the feature should be located (degrees).
